problems.title: Factorial Using Recursion
problems.description:
Compute the factorial of a non-negative integer N using recursion. Factorial is defined as: N! = N * (N-1)! with 0! = 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print a single integer representing N!.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
120

Sample Input
0

Sample Output
1
hintsList: Base case: if n == 0 return 1. Recursive case: n * factorial(n-1).
